premium.description: You are currently subscribed to Bible Strong Sponsor. You have access to the following features
Soutenez l'application, Devenez un spons: Support the application, Become a sponsor!
Vous devez √™tre enregistr√© pour acc√©d: You must be registered to access the subscription offer.
√ätes-vous vraiment sur de supprimer cet: Are you sure you want to delete this database?
Si votre base de donn√©es a √©t√© corrom: If your database has been corrupted, remember to restart the application once the files have been downloaded.
J'ai regroup√© ici la plupart des questi: I have grouped here most of the questions that are regularly asked to me.
Si l'application est lente sur votre t√©:
If the application is slow on your phone, I'm sorry. Bible Strong uses lexicon and dictionary databases that contain thousands of entries. Generally recent phones have good performance on the application. 

I will optimize some parts of the app like the lexicon and the dictionary in the future.
L'application prend beaucoup de place: The application takes up a lot of space
J'ai fait le choix de vous fournir le le:
I have chosen to provide you with the lexicon, the Bibles and the offline dictionary to facilitate quick access. 

The advantage is of course the fast and offline access of all your information, the drawback is the size of the application. 

 ~ 25Mo for the dictionary, ~ 30Mo for the Hebrew lexicon. Each bible weighs around ~ 5MB.

 In the whole application can reach up to 200MB, so make sure you have room.
faq.bugNoticedAnswer: To avoid overloading the team's solo developer, only sponsors can submit bugs using the link "Submit a bug " in the "Plus " section.
faq.whiteScreenQuestion: I have a white screen when I want to read the Bible
faq.whiteScreenAnswer: This bug seems to appear on certain phone models (Tecno, Infinix ...).If you have an Android 6 or lower version, you can update Android System WebView in the Play Store.
faq.ideaAnswer: To avoid overloading the team's solo developer, only sponsors can submit ideas using the link "Submit an idea " in the "Plus " section.
Pourquoi l‚Äôapplication contient-elle d: Why does the app contain Adventist content?
L'app contient du contenu adventiste, ma: The app contains Adventist content, but also content from other faiths. I did not focus on religion, but rather on the quality of the content. For example, the Amazing Facts timeline is the only one I know of as complete. If you do not share the Adventist faith, it is normal that you may disagree with certain content.
who-are-you:
Very good question ! My name is St√©phane, I am 30 years old, I have been designing and developing web and mobile for 10 years. 

I come from Martinique, I am a Seventh-day Adventist and I am currently living in New Zealand with my wife. 

I decided to create this application because I couldn't find one that met my needs in terms of ease of use and ergonomics for studying the Bible. I wanted to organize my verses, write my studies, take my notes, see them directly integrated into my bible, create my tags, etc. 

I therefore wish to contribute to the building by offering a free application, funded by donations and sponsors. :).

Vous souhaitez aller plus loin ?: Do you want to go further?
Traduction de la Chronologie biblique <2: Translation of the Biblical Chronology <2> " The Bible Timeline "</2>, courtesy of <4> Amazing Facts </4>
Comment avez-vous d√©termin√© les dates,: How did you determine the dates, especially the creation date?
Quelles sont vos principales sources pou: What are your main sources for the timeline?
Voici une liste des sources utilis√©es,: Here is a list of sources used, among others, to create the timeline
Pr√©voyez-vous la date du retour du Chri: Do you foresee the date of Christ's return?
Non. La Bible dit que quant au jour et √: No. The Bible says that as to the day and time of Christ's return, no one knows. See Matthew 24; 50. Furthermore, Christ's return will only come after other prophetic achievements have occurred - and we also don't know when they will happen. The purpose of the timeline is not to predict when exactly future events will occur, but rather to show the reliability of the Bible as a historical document, its reliability in prophecy and as a tool for in-depth study of the Bible.
Une error est survenue, la base de donn√: An error has occurred, the database may be corrupt. Go to the download management to redownload the database.

Lexique contenu les strongs grecs et h√©: Lexicon contains Greek and Hebrew strongs with their concordance and definitions
Dictionnaire Encyclop√©dique de la Bible: Encyclopedic Dictionary of the Bible A. Westphal.
Plus de 20.000 sujets et sous-th√®mes, e: More than 20,000 subjects and sub-themes, and 100,000 references to the Scriptures.
L‚Äôun des ensembles les plus complets d: One of the most complete sets of cross-references ever compiled, comprising over 572,000 entries.
Commentaires concis de Matthew Henry. Tr: Concise comments by Matthew Henry. Translation by Dominique Osch√©.

premium.renew: All subscriptions are renewed monthly automatically.You can cancel them when you wish.
premium.earnings.500.description: This amount represents the different operating costs of the app (servers, services, etc.) and increases in proportion to the number of subscribers.
premium.earnings.1500.description: With your support, I can work part-time on the application and use consultants to make it even more qualitative! The new features and improvements will be delivered faster.

app.syncError: An error occurred while synchronizing your data. Please save your data manually
app.exportDesc:
Normally your data is automatically synchronized, but in some cases it may happen that you need to do it manually. 

When you export your data, a file is created on your phone. You can then share it by email or other means of your choice.
app.importDesc:
The import file must be in SAVE.BIBLESTRONG format and contain data from your account. 

WARNING, imports crushes all existing data. Make sure you have a recent backup before continuing.
backup.title: Backup
backups.title: Automatic Backups
backups.description: Your data is automatically backed up regularly. The 10 most recent backups are kept.
backups.none:
No backups available at this time.
Backups will be created automatically.
backups.restoreMessage:
